title: Building a Modern News Website with React and Tailwind CSS

title: Creating a Scalable CRM Dashboard with Next.js and shadcn/ui

description: Explore the latest features in Next.js 15 and how to migrate your existing projects.

description: Step-by-step guide to building a full-stack URL shortener using Next.js and Supabase.

title: Understanding JWT Authentication in Modern Web Apps
description: A deep dive into JWT, refresh tokens, and how to implement secure authentication in your apps.
